name: Bot World
description:
Bot World is a zelda-like game about exploring locations, upgrading your weapons and destroying scary bosses.

Survive in the world of nuclear war, which was captured by huge slugs, mutant wasps and scary robots who took up arms against all mankind. You will always have your robot assistant with you, which will help you improve your weapons all the way.

Features: bosses, upgrade weapons, many levels and locations, hand-drawn graphics.
